I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
my favorite band is one direction.
when i retire i want to open a bakery.
I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing.
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

content.text: What are your favorite things to do?
I like to go to Comic Con and Express my creativity.
That's fun! I love to go to Comic Con too, it's a great place to be yourself.
I hear you! I love to go out to pizza with my friends, we can't live without each other.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
I love animals! I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit.
That's so sweet! I hope to open a bakery when I retire, I love to cook and bake.
That sounds like a great idea! I love to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden.
That's awesome! I love to be able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
That's really impressive! I am gay but I haven't told my parents yet.
I'm glad you're able to be yourself at Comic Con. It's really important to be true to yourself.
